# BundleNudge

> OTA updates for React Native. Push JavaScript changes directly to users.

## What is BundleNudge?

BundleNudge enables over-the-air updates for React Native apps. Deploy JavaScript changes instantly without App Store review.

- [Installation](/docs/getting-started/installation.md): How to install the SDK

## Code Structure

- [packages/api/]: Cloudflare Workers API (Hono + Drizzle)
- [packages/sdk/]: React Native SDK
- [packages/dashboard/]: Next.js management dashboard
- [packages/shared/]: Shared TypeScript types
- [packages/builder/]: Bundle builder service
- [packages/worker/]: Mac build worker

## Tech Stack

- **API**: Cloudflare Workers, Hono.js, Drizzle ORM, Zod
- **Storage**: Cloudflare R2 (bundles), D1 (metadata), KV (rate limits)
- **SDK**: React Native 0.72+, react-native-fs
- **Dashboard**: Next.js 15, React 19, TanStack Query, Tailwind CSS
- **Testing**: Vitest

## Key Concepts

- **Bundle**: JavaScript code bundle for React Native
- **Release**: A version of your app's JavaScript code
- **Update**: The process of delivering a new bundle to devices
- **Rollback**: Reverting to a previous bundle version after detecting issues
- **Delta Update**: Only downloading the changed parts of a bundle

## Code Conventions

- Max 250 lines per file
- Max 50 lines per function
- No `any` types (use `unknown`)
- Named exports only (no default exports)
- Colocated tests (file.ts + file.test.ts)
- Zod for all validation
